##Rural Life in epidemic situation

WECHAT dandureading

Function introduction single reading is a brand publication of one-way space, which unites a new generation of writers and readers. Its content is mainly fiction, poetry, cultural criticism, ideological essays, non-fiction reports and works of art, respect quiet, deep, elegant reading, respect sober, unique, dynamic voice, committed to become a source of ideas for young people around the world.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
The slogan "vast world, great achievements" has resounded through the motherland. In the decades that followed, attention shifted sharply to the cities and never looked back. During this period of development, the city has undoubtedly become the focus of attention. But we know little about the daily life and health of our countrymen in the countryside. Today's two submissions, both from the home of two rural readers friends, with their eyes, we look at the epidemic in the countryside.

The nourishment of the Earth

By Ye Lihong

Shut-in for 20 days, the family almost ran out of food and ammunition, and dare not go out to add chaos. Every meal Cook Countless Times before looking at the refrigerator, see the door and half a package of dried shrimp, eyes a bright. "there is the taste of both the mountain and the sea. " Okay, let's have a cabbage stir-fried shrimp. One cabbage has been eaten for four or five meals. Change it up. I hope the kids like it.

I grew up in the countryside, looking at the grains in the soil —————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— --. But these monotonous staple foods are the food of the farmer's family for the whole year.

"The granary has grain, in the mind does not panic. " Has the plan, can calculate the farmer women dexterously to change the pattern, diligently understands the storage. Every day from morning to night to keep tossing, such as the animals over the winter, always for a family of stomachs, planning, control.

Here comes the green vegetables. Fried Rice with green vegetables, handmade noodles with green vegetables, stir-fried green vegetables and hot sauce. The most extravagant is the vegetable Fried Bacon, to a few dishes we also swept away. For a change, my brother and I had a good meal. Seeing the spring warming up, green vegetables are about to bolting. Mother quickly took advantage of the Sunny Day, removed the green leaves to feed the pigs, the rest of the dishes Bangzi put in the sun on a day. Cut into shreds, serve with Distiller's grains, peppers, and salt, and seal in an urn. Such as the height of summer, a light white porridge, a wine Lees Dish Bang, that refreshing, addictive. The radishes are sliced and then dried in the sun. Next Spring, Bacon and radish in the pot that such as milk-like soup, a think of the two cheeks Sheng Jin. The turnips are completely pressed under the pickles. After a month of Marinating, crisp raw, in between the teeth rustle. You can eat more bowls of rice with this kind of food.

Childhood taste buds, are parents rely on a hoe, a dig from the soil. Those vegetables and radishes alert us to the origin of our lives, those grains become the blood that nourishes our lives.

In the afternoon, make some Pumpkin Buns! When my old mother gave it to me, I secretly disapproved of the ugliness of its whole body. Now, thanks to her, steamed Bun has a golden soul. The pumpkin is very big and weighs more than ten Jin. I cut a small piece, cooked it, and with a spoon in my hand I scraped off the Yellow Flesh, as if my mother had stooped to lift the Pumpkin into the basket. With this in mind, I subconsciously scraped and scraped the rind again and again.

His father had a pension, and they were old enough to support themselves, but their parents were still stubbornly guarding a vegetable field in the countryside. Every time I go back, my car is full of seasonal fruits and vegetables. In the past few years, I have tried my best to persuade them not to get busy. But I say what I say, they do what they do. Now, also want to understand: the fields are their life-long sustenance. In the soil, they will feel that they are still young, there is endless work, endless energy.

But most of the time, the fruits and vegetables they took from them would not be eaten. Seeing them a little shrivelled, the heart is really not taste, looked and looked, touched and touched, how also can not bear to deal with? It's not that I feel I have to be thrifty, even if I don't wear a coat, I don't like to throw it away, even if it's a hundred-yuan-a-catty seafood that isn't fresh. The same vegetables, bought by themselves, can feel at ease to throw away, but it is the elderly parents, one by one dig, one by one. At the thought of their old figures at work, chewing their food, I felt myself damp and heavy, and able to settle down to the task at hand. You can lean over and see, one by one, the individuals running for their lives.

My mother also taught me how to make steamed bread. Mother says, see a person can knead dough, see him after kneading, cutting board has been stuck.

Stir in the yeast. To start, Nuonuo pumpkins and dried wheat flour are slowly woven together. Continue to spread the small handfuls of flour on the cutting board. Once the dough is wrapped, it will absorb the flour onto the body like a magnet. Where there is powder, you roll the dough with your hands, and it's gone.

In the ceaseless rubbing, that faint, unique fragrance of wheat permeates in the air. It's like the family's come to life. This collection of nature snow and ice dew of wheat fragrance, let me inexplicably think of the childhood spring field, patches of purple cloud flower blooming field. That one after another in the flowers running between the small children, do not know where they are now comfortable, okay?

Wake up more than half an hour later, open the pot lid, a sour and sweet after fermentation of the special flavor, Tangy and come. This is how familiar with the smell of early childhood into the kitchen, the dawn of the day for our mother steamed bread taste.

Of all the ingredients, wheat flour is my favorite. She can change 9981, long noodles, fat steamed bread, crispy fried dough sticks, are his gorgeous after the figure. Tune, knead, roll, the more ravaged, the more powerful. In particular, the fermentation of this process, so that the emergence of wheat flour into a butterfly, dance.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
Ripe Golden ears of wheat. Photo by Norickrflickr

In wechat circles, a short video showing the empty streets of this quiet town is being broadcast. Outside, it's never been so quiet. But in this home, fireworks in the smell of rice, stir-fry flavor, fermented flavor, all kinds of cooking and frying flavor, it is because of their diffuse, only temporarily expelled the epidemic to our panic.

Indeed, if it hadn't been for this sudden outbreak, I might have forgotten how simple ingredients used to be worth their weight in gold. But with daily restrictions on shopping, we can only be careful, for the children out of all kinds of tricks to meet their tricky taste buds. And oneself in the coarse tea plain rice, just more think of that year to eat the most simple memory of taste.

His 15-year-old son was a teenager, and he was hungry all day. Usually think of his long, changing the way is to consider both nutrition, but also to cater to his taste. These two days, although his mouth does not say, but on the table can be a drooping head.

Steaming steamed bread on the table, I word for word like a child, it seems to be said to themselves: "A hot mouth to eat, it is good enough. "

It's good to have a hot meal!

***

Life in an epidemic in a village in Henan Province

By Xu Wenwen

Near noon, my mother in the kitchen, while cooking nagging: "Do not let out at home, can only wait to eat to die. "

But I have to comfort her. I said, "you're an open-minded woman, and you know exactly what's going on, so don't swear. I selfishly think she's different from the average woman. "

My mother works in a factory in the county, which has nearly 800 people. We all know that, to some extent, people are difficult to manage, so the factory must establish a set of extremely tight and organized management.

Before the Lantern Festival, she sat down at the dinner table and said to all of us, "You see, our factory has now started to count what people will have for dinner on the first night after they arrive. Everyone can not go out, but I would like to see how the leaders will let people go. " There was a mixture of pride and contempt in the tone, emotions are interesting. But I could hear it in her voice. She wanted to go to work. Because she wanted to make money. Earning and saving money for Xu Wenlong, her dearest son, was her sole purpose and Credo. The will is clear, sharper than my father's will.

The day after the Lantern Festival, the factory began to count how many workers needed a car to pick them up. Even if work could be started, it would be extremely difficult for many people to get there, as basic transportation has been shut down. How far the road cross-regional traffic how to calculate, there is no plan in the factory, direct first statistics who need to pick up. After dinner at home, my mother turned on her cell phone and saw the news. She was so excited that she pulled a towel from the clothesline above the vegetable pool to wipe her hands, quickly replies to messages in the group.

"Gu Hongyu and I need a car. "

Gu Hongyu was a friend my mother had dated for many years after she married on this street. They agreed to go into the factory together and live in the same dormitory. We'd come home every weekend. She later saw the group message, in fact, red should have replied. (we used to call the Valley Red Rain Red, which reminded me of the colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and his ritual tour of the year, with pioneers mostly coming from the everyday system.)

On the third day after the Lantern Festival, my mother was in the courtyard shouting, this call him to go, the superior notice must be arranged to live in a factory workers a room, there are not so many houses to live. She said this time, the mood and the Lantern Festival in the factory before the rice when the newspaper is the same. Proud and disdainful. Actually, I don't think she's too happy about it. Because last night after the car pick-up list, she asked my father to quickly heat the water the next day to be steamed bread, she also said to steam more pots. But the next day there was no steamed Bun.

She was already making arrangements to leave for work at the factory and preparing food for the rest of the family. But now she can't go. I was so happy that my mother was able to cook again.

I hold the timing around the Lantern Festival. As I'm sure you've all been feeling a little time-weary, I don't want to stress the date or the day of the week, so the Lantern Festival is the biggest, most stable, and most clear. We all need to be clear-headed in these hazy times, when we are full of troubles and hardships, or when we keep secrets.

One of my perplexities is why the management of their factory has a series of harassment operations around the Lantern Festival. According to my mother, the boss and other management personnel are mostly from the Hubei side of the people, want to come to work should be more difficult. The accountant who does the logistics management should also feel that this front and back is too expensive. Every day, we should count whether each workshop staff is sick, cold and fever, and make statistics on the Worker's registered address and detailed home address. Everyone had to report it, and anyone who failed to report it by the end of the day was punished by cleaning the dorm for a week after work began. My mom says I don't want to be punished.

The boss couldn't get through, the workers couldn't get through, the warehouse district was full of supplies, and there was a lot of planning going on. In fact, I think a factory of this size is doing quite well. These day-to-day statistics and multiple operations are an important part of ensuring production safety and the safety of human life.

The three shops on the corner won't open, and the rest of the restaurant is out of the question. The woman who owns the House on our street is very clever. Send her a message telling her what you need and she delivers it to the door. She rode her bicycle round the street every day, and though she wore a mask, and did not talk much, she only talked a little, but I think she found it very exciting. Because there are two or four people on patrol on every street in the village, plus a disinfectant spray.

My sister is married to the one in the back street. Her house is not more than 500 meters away from my house. She will come every day, wearing a mask and a hat, pushing a cart carrying Liang Shuo. Our family fought over who could hold Xiao Shuo, but he always wanted to go outside. He learned to walk later than the other children, so he ran more urgently. At the sound of a patrol car horn in the street, my mother yanked his tiny arms and ran home. Every time in the outside are not too far from the door, for fear of being scolded, it is particularly embarrassing.

The latest news is that the village chief was called out by the mayor to give some instructions. I hear we're a little too humane around here. It's not appropriate to sit at the door with a bowl for dinner. In front of our house is a square, square dance gala is always held here, behind is a basketball court, young men, men love to go. So, our family is the MODEL, the hot zone and the source of the right and wrong.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
Henan Province, one of China's largest agricultural provinces, is a farm in Henan Province. Photograph: Dream Corps Dreamsflickr

Yesterday morning, I sat in front of the door eaves of the upper house and said to my mother, I want to see the apple trees blossom. My Mom said, "go to the West Room and get an apple, see if you can taste the blossom. ".

Immediately, the parents discussed to prepare the yard on a pear tree grafting apple branches, let the Pear Tree Apple. There was an apple tree in the yard of my grandmother's house, and a date tree near the toilet on the east side, which was a serious romantic tree. The apple tree, with its bushy leaves and small snow-white flowers, I went back in early autumn and found a green apple tree.

Mom and dad spent the morning scooping up the vegetables in the vegetable pond, which left a lot of dust on the leaves, before making room to plant strawberries. I mean, it's hard to see the two of you getting along so well, pulling together like this. Now all the streets are closed by barbed wire, even electric vehicles and bicycles can not cross. I finally realized that a lot of things must be done early, the later, the more difficult.

On the afternoon of February 7, when my father and I were shoveling snow in the yard, I suddenly stopped what I was doing and said to him, "Dad, the doctor the other day, the one who printed his handprint, Li Wenliang, has passed away. " My father listened, he banged the broom on the trunk of the Pear Tree, then turned to me and said, "well, he's sick after all, and it's really hard to cure. " At that moment my mother was in the kitchen, then I asked her: "Mom, when will peach blossom. " My Mom said: "March, school silly. " I said: "I just want to see peach blossom, also do not steal peach, can see. " I from my feet, began to walk, less than 20 minutes, we can walk to Tao Lin. I want to Kowtow.

It's supposed to be cold on duty tonight, and there's a strong wind outside. My family couldn't get out, so my mother cooked steamed Buns, steamed vegetables, Fried Chicken, and pancakes on the Kang. She cooked in different ways and never mentioned going to work in the factory again.

The other day my mom said she was too fat to jump rope. I had no coordination, so my dad and I had to throw her a rope. She danced for a while, thinking it would be too boring to work with us, and took it out to the plaza, thinking that it was after dinner that the patrol would be less engaged. She had just summoned a group of women to jump, and within twenty minutes they were being yelled at. She ran fast without the rope and quickly closed the gate.

Coming up, we'll wait for the first cold snap of the year.

Since the essay, we have received a large number of submissions, writing truthfully about what they saw and heard during the epidemic. It will be a sincere and weighty record, and we will keep it.

Anonymous@owspace. Com
